scripts.get:core: curl -LO http://wordpress.org/latest.zip && cd ../ && mkdir dist && cd dist && mkdir admin && cd ../constructor && mv latest.zip ../dist/admin/ && unzip -d ../dist/admin/ ../dist/admin/latest.zip && rm ../dist/admin/latest.zip && mv ../dist/admin/wordpress/* ../dist/admin/ && rm -rf ../dist/admin/wordpress && rm -rf ../dist/admin/wp-content/plugins/akismet && rm ../dist/admin/wp-content/plugins/hello.php && rm -rf ../dist/admin/wp-content/themes/twenty* &&  curl -LO http://reactwp.com/download/plugins/advanced-custom-fields-pro.zip && mv advanced-custom-fields-pro.zip ../dist/admin/wp-content/plugins && unzip -d ../dist/admin/wp-content/plugins ../dist/admin/wp-content/plugins/advanced-custom-fields-pro.zip && rm ../dist/admin/wp-content/plugins/advanced-custom-fields-pro.zip
